verses.name: Matthew 12:8
verses.text: For the Son of man is Lord even of the sabbath day.

verses.name: Matthew 12:9
verses.text: And when he was departed thence, he went into their synagogue:

verses.name: Matthew 12:10
verses.text: And, behold, there was a man which had his hand withered. And they asked him, saying, Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days? that they might accuse him.

verses.name: Matthew 12:11
verses.text: And he said unto them, What man shall there be among you, that shall have one sheep, and if it fall into a pit on the sabbath day, will he not lay hold on it, and lift it out?
